Snippet.Name: Function
Snippet.Text:
IF object_id('object_id') IS NOT NULL BEGIN PRINT 'Dropping function' DROP FUNCTION IF @@ERROR = 0 PRINT 'Function dropped' END go
CREATE FUNCTION /*********************************************************** * Function description: * Date: %DATE% * Author: %OSUSER% * * Changes * Date Modified By Comments ************************************************************ * ************************************************************/ ( /*parameters*/ ) RETURNS /*data_type*/ BEGIN DECLARE @v_ret /*data_type*/
SET @v_ret = /*expression*/
RETURN @v_ret END
